skill.name: health-trend-analyzer
skill.summary: Analyze health data trends over time. Correlate medications, symptoms, vital signs, lab results, and other health metrics.
skill.author: huifer

security_audit.summary: The skill is a documentation and template-based health trend analysis tool. Static findings are false positives: code examples in markdown files were flagged as 'external_commands' but are not executable. This skill does not execute any code, shell commands, or cryptographic operations.

medium_findings.title: Ruby/shell backtick execution patterns in documentation
medium_findings.description: Static scanner detected backtick patterns in markdown files. These are code examples in documentation, not executable code.

low_findings.title: Hardcoded URLs in template files
low_findings.description: Template files contain hardcoded CDN URLs for ECharts and similar resources. These are standard practice for chart visualization libraries.

content.value_statement: Users struggle to identify patterns in their health data over time. This skill correlates medications, symptoms, vital signs, and lab results to reveal trends and provide actionable health insights through interactive visualizations.
actual_capabilities: Analyze health data trends over custom time periods
Correlate medications, symptoms, vital signs, lab results, and emotional state
Identify concerning trends, improvements, and data-driven health insights
Generate interactive HTML visualization reports with ECharts
Perform multi-dimensional analysis including weight/BMI, symptoms, medication adherence, lab results, and sleep patterns
Detect correlations and changes between different health metrics
limitations: Does not provide medical diagnosis or treatment recommendations
Cannot access real-time health data without user-provided input
Visualization reports require ECharts library (loaded via CDN)
Analysis quality depends on completeness and accuracy of input data

use_cases.title: Track Medication Effectiveness
use_cases.description: Patients can analyze how their symptoms change in relation to medication changes, identifying which treatments correlate with symptom improvement.

use_cases.title: Identify Health Patterns
use_cases.description: Users can discover correlations between lifestyle factors (sleep, mood, activity) and health metrics, enabling proactive health management.

use_cases.title: Prepare Health Summaries
use_cases.description: Healthcare providers or caregivers can generate trend reports to share with medical professionals during consultations.

prompt_templates.title: Basic Health Trend Query
prompt_templates.scenario: When user asks about general health changes over time

prompt_templates.title: Symptom-Medication Correlation
prompt_templates.scenario: When user wants to understand medication effectiveness

prompt_templates.title: Comprehensive Health Report

prompt_templates.scenario: When user requests comprehensive health analysis

prompt_templates.title: Specific Metric Deep Dive
prompt_templates.scenario: When user wants detailed analysis of a specific health metric

best_practices: Provide comprehensive health data including dates, measurements, symptoms, and medications for accurate analysis
Use consistent units and time formats across all input data
Generate and review the HTML visualization reports for better pattern recognition
anti_patterns: Asking for medical diagnosis or treatment recommendations instead of trend analysis
Providing incomplete or inconsistent health data that may lead to inaccurate conclusions
Relying solely on automated analysis without consulting healthcare professionals for medical decisions
